sentences.en: But the most challenging and attimes anxiety - provoking is tour guide.
sentences.cn: 但最具挑战、有时还让人焦虑万分的就是导游.

sentences.en: He could not give up his ideal of provoking a quarrel.
sentences.cn: 他不能放弃挑起一场争吵的想法.

sentences.en: He hung back from provoking any confrontation.
sentences.cn: 他犹豫着不愿意挑起对抗.

sentences.en: He was aware, more than ever , of the provoking woman - child quality.
sentences.cn: 他格外感觉到她那种诱人的又象少妇、又象孩子的魅力.

sentences.en: One day, walked along a lot of, hungry and provoking.
sentences.cn: 一天, 走了好多路, 饥饿难熬.

sentences.en: Perhaps I was too saucy and provoking.
sentences.cn: 可能是我太莽撞无礼,咄咄逼人了.

sentences.en: Small head, YuanLiuLiu eyes needful, plus furry body, especially provoking love.
sentences.cn: 小脑袋, 圆溜溜的眼睛转个不停, 再加上毛茸茸的身体, 特别惹人喜欢.

sentences.en: Some men lashed out curses, thereby provoking him to anger.
sentences.cn: 有些人大肆咒骂, 因而惹怒了他.

sentences.en: South and North Koreas blamed each other for provoking the clash.
sentences.cn: 南北韩相互指责对方挑起冲突.

sentences.en: The remarks are meaningful and thought - provoking.

sentences.cn: 这些问题可以诱导大家去思考.

sentences.en: These forms of art are large, bold and bright and certainly make a poignant statement - regardless of what that public statement may be, it is powerful and thought provoking.
sentences.cn: 这些形式上的艺术是巨大的、大胆的和明亮的并且可能制造痛苦的声明-不管公共声明是什么，都是强有力的和思想激怒的。

sentences.en: They all agreed again and again how provoking it was to be so disappointed.
sentences.cn: 大家异口同声地诉说着这种失望是多么令人懊恼.

sentences.en: They can push ahead with their settlement and risk provoking a backlash.
sentences.cn: 他们能在和解与风险激起反弹的情况下向前推进.

sentences.en: This is an entertaining yet thought-provoking film.
sentences.cn: 这部电影令人捧腹，却又发人深省。

sentences.en: Xinhua says Lan's death is provoking outrage on Internet sites in China.
sentences.cn: 新华社还说,兰成长的死引发了网民的愤慨.

words.tran_cn: 刺激的；令人生气的，激怒人的

trans.tran_cn: 令人生气的，使人恼火的，刺激的
激起( provoke的现在分词 )，惹怒，引起，引发
